Metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Sprunki Infected
Metadata.description: Learn about our commitment to protecting your privacy while you enjoy the thrilling puzzle adventure of Sprunki Infected.

title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Safeguarding Your Data in the World of Sprunki Infected

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.content: In Sprunki Infected, we collect game-related data such as your progress, level completion times, and in-game choices. This information helps us improve gameplay and tailor your gaming experience.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your data, ensuring it's as safe as the healthy Sprunkies you collect. Our team constantly monitors and updates our security protocols to maintain the integrity of your information.

cookieUsage.title: Cookie Usage
cookieUsage.content: Cookies are utilized to remember your game preferences and settings, similar to how Sprunki remembers the layout of each puzzle level. These cookies enhance your gaming experience by providing a more personalized adventure.

policyUpdate.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdate.content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices or new features in Sprunki Infected. We recommend checking this policy regularly to stay informed about how we handle your information.

noLogin.title: No Login Required
noLogin.content: Sprunki Infected is designed for immediate play without requiring account creation or login. You can start your Sprunki adventure instantly in your browser, with no need to provide personal identification information.
